about.description.output: This bot was created by and for Winx fans, it allows for users to level up and earn new transformations, it is entirely customisable from transformation names to when you get each!
givexp.fail.output: As Iffffff i'm gonna give out free xp!
help.title: Categories
help.footer: You can do {0}help [category] to get the commands in a certain category!
checkbans.bans: Deleted {0} banned user(s) from levels database!
checklevels.start: Started checking! This may take a very, very long time!
patreon.user.not: That user is not a patreon!
patreon.user.already: That user is already a patreon!
setlevel.output: Set the level of {0} to {1} and xp to {2}!
levelchannel.missing.channel: Levels channel is does not exist anymore!
setmaxlength.error: The maximum length can't be lower than the minimum length!
setminlength.error: The minimum length can't be higher than the maximum length!
setmaxmessage.set: Max messages per minute is now `{0}`
setrank.gifs.norole: There is no role assigned to this level, cannot add gifs!
setrank.rank.none: There is no rank with this level!
barcolor.command.description: Sets the color of your bar!
cardcolor.command.description: Set the color of your card!
circlecolor.command.description: Set the color of your card circle!
namecolor.command.description: Set the color of your name!
contactcreator.command.description: Contact the creator of the bot!
suggestion.command.description: Suggest a feature for the bot!
checkbans.command.description: Remove banned users from levels database!
checklblevels.command.description: Checks the levels of all the users in the leaderboad!
checklevels.command.description: Checks the levels of a specific user!
checkranks.command.description: Adds/removes transformation roles from users depending on their level!
patreon.command.description: Set or get list of patreons!
excludechannel.command.description: Excludes a channel from earning xp!
levelchannel.command.description: Sets channel where level ups go to!
setmaxlength.command.description: Set maximum length of message to give XP!
setmaxmessage.command.description: Set maximum of messages per minute!
setminlength.command.description: Set minimum length of message to give XP!
